name: Haruyoshi Nishikata
description: Haruyoshi Nishikata was an individual that found himself fleeing his home country ofJapanafter letting his moral values overthrow the oath he took as a doctor of medicine. He takes pride in achieving the title of world's best surgeon vocally and attributes it to having good instincts. Haruyoshi's misfortune started once he found one of theTyger Clawbosses on his operating table. Despite having a clear duty as a surgeon, he chose to take matters into his own hands for a greater good and allowed the surgery to fail. With his reputation of making no mistakes, the cause for the results of the...
